resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
pitrou opened a new pull request #96:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/96


   - Update chair to Wes from Jacques
   - Reorganize YAML file to make it easier to edit and maintain
   
   I looked for ways to automate this, but the info exposed by the ASF
   isn't exactly what we're looking for:
   - some names are missing diacritics
   - affiliation is not recorded
   
   (https://home.apache.org/phonebook-about.html)


----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11876

pitrou commented on pull request #96:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/96#issuecomment-792691071


   I realize some names are missing on our governance page:
   * Deepak Majeti @majetideepak, [committer](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=mdeepak)
   * Ravindra Pindikura @pravindra, [committer](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=ravindra)
   * Todd Lipcon @toddlipcon, [PMC](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=todd)
   * Michael Stack @saintstack, [PMC](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=stack)
   
   To the people cc'ed above: I need your respective affiliations to add you to the list.
   


----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

pitrou edited a comment on pull request #96:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/96#issuecomment-792691071


   I realize some names are missing on our governance page:
   * Andrew Lamb @alamb, [committer](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=alamb)
   * Deepak Majeti @majetideepak, [committer](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=mdeepak)
   * Ravindra Pindikura @pravindra, [committer](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=ravindra)
   * Todd Lipcon @toddlipcon, [PMC](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=todd)
   * Michael Stack @saintstack, [PMC](https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html?uid=stack)
   
   To the people cc'ed above: I need your respective affiliations to add you to the list.

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/96#issuecomment-792706276


   Current output of verification script:
   ```
   $ ./scripts/check_committers.py 
   Missing PMCs in local list: ['stack', 'todd']
   Missing committers in local list: ['alamb', 'mdeepak', 'ravindra']
   ```

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
The governance wasn't updated when [~wesm] became the new PMC chair.

Other updates may be necessary (is the list of committers and PMC members generated automatically?).

comments.body: The list of committers & PMC is in https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/blob/master/_data/committers.yml, so that's where you'd make the change indicating Wes as VP and to add any new contributors. The table on the website is generated from that yml.

Hmm, and it seems the authoritative committer and PMC list is here:
https://home.apache.org/phonebook.html

Perhaps we should take a pass and look for missing updates to the website.
